channel.title: Unlocking the power of data visualization with R

item.title: 30DayMapChallenge 2021
item.description:
Metamapping Day
This is the collage of all maps made for 2021.
Nov 30, 2021

Null
This map is a .tif image of the Earth downloaded from Earth-SAT.
Nov 29, 2021

The Earth is not flat
Nov 28, 2021

This is America hand made map.

Map with a New Tool
This map is made with Studio Unfolded AI and then styled with R.

This map represent the NATURAL EARTH GDP ESTIMATION, data is from the {rnaturalearth} package - View: EPSG:5368.

3d
The data for this World 3D map is a Sat-view (8am 11.11.2021-GMT+11), data is from bom.gov.au and the {bomrang} package.

This map Globe Observer shows Sat View of Australia, data is from the Australian Bureau of Meterorology and the {ozmaps} for the geometry of Australia.

This map of Greater London with cycle hire and borough boundaries is created using data from TidyTuesday 2021 week 45 - {spData}.

This US Drought map shows available values by County - Jan to July 2021, data is from TidyTuesday 2021 week 30.

This map of Berlin water is made with data from {osmdata} package.
Nov 5, 2021

Hexagons
This map of Boston is made with data from {spData} package.
Nov 4, 2021

The Isole Åland belonged to the provinces that the…

Lines
This map of France is created with data from the {maps} R-package.

item.title: 30DayMapChallenge 2022
item.description:
Remix
Improving map Islands (day 26) with Campsites in Urupukapuka Island no dogs allowed. Data is from the New Zealand Hydrographic Authority & data.govt.nz.
Nov 30, 2022

Out of my comfort zone
Foursquare Map Month Competition Winner: United States Permanent amount of precipitations on Global Railways.
Nov 29, 2022

3d
Map of Oregon Population Density. Data is from Kontur population US and the {tigris} package.
Nov 28, 2022

Music
US Map of Artists by states distribution. Data is from TidyTuesday 2022 week 39 US Artists.
Nov 27, 2022

Islands
A static leaflet map of Islands, data is from the New Zealand Hydrographic Authority.
Nov 26, 2022

Colour Friday: 2 Colors
This map of Alaska housing is made with FourSquare Studio.

Fantasy
Astonishing World Map projection: projection_bonne. Data is from the {rnaturalearth} package.

Movement

This is the Happy Planet Index - World Map, data is from the {tmap} package.

My Favourite
This last map of the #30DayMapChallenge month is my favourite view of the life expectancy. Source of data are Statistics Netherlands (CBS) and Kadaster Nederland via the …

Population
This Ireland Map explore the population density in the area. Data is from the latest version of Kontur Population available at United Nations Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX).
